category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, Eliminates toxins and kills Intestinal parasites

indications: Internally or topically for Damp-Heat dermatological disorders: carbuncles, eczema, lesions and pimples, lymphatic inflammation(Chuang Yung)

Diarrhea, dysentery, intestinal abscess, jaundice, influenza, septicemia, moist fungal infections, lead toxicity, tonsillitis, laryngitis, bronchitis, enteritis, swollen and painful throat, abnormal swelling of the Stomach or Intestines, leptospirosis, malaria, scarlet fever, urinary tract infection, post-surgical inflammation

action.primary: Clears Liver Yang and brightens the eyes

indications: Redness, pain and swelling of the eyes
Hyperemia of the eye due to Wind-Fire, nebula
As eye drops for chronic conjunctivitis, trachoma, keratitis, corneal ulcers

contraindications: Avoid using this herb at full dosage for over four weeks as there may be slight cumulative toxicity.

notes: This herb can be used alone as a wash for eye disorders.
